    • Method Detail

      • forecast

        void forecast(int days,
              SolarSystem s)
        Executes a forecast simulation for a solar system
        Parameters:
        s - a SolarSystem
        days - an int to indicate the number of days for executing the forecast simulation

      • getWeather

        DayStatus getWeather(int day)
        Gets the DayStatus of an specific day
        Parameters:
        day - an int
        Returns:
        DayStatus corresponding to that day

      • getSimulationResult

        SimulationResult getSimulationResult()
        Gets the result of the simulation
        Returns:
        a SimulationResult of the forecast simulation
